CertificateFilePath.description: Gets or sets the local path to a certificate file on disk. Use 'Steeltoe.Common.Certificates.CertificateSettings.PrivateKeyFilePath' if the private key is stored in another file.

PrivateKeyFilePath.description: Gets or sets the local path to a private key file on disk (optional).

Certificates.description: Configuration settings for certificate access. Indicates where to load a 'System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2' from.

CertificateFilePath.description: Gets or sets the local path to a certificate file on disk. Use 'Steeltoe.Common.Certificates.CertificateSettings.PrivateKeyFilePath' if the private key is stored in another file.

PrivateKeyFilePath.description: Gets or sets the local path to a private key file on disk (optional).

additionalProperties.description: Configuration settings for certificate access. Indicates where to load a 'System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2' from.

Datacenter.description: Gets or sets the datacenter name passed in each request to the server.

DefaultQueryTag.description: Gets or sets the tag to filter on when querying for service instances.

DefaultZoneMetadataName.description: Gets or sets the metadata key name for 'Steeltoe.Discovery.Consul.Configuration.ConsulDiscoveryOptions.InstanceZone'.

Deregister.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to de-register the running app on shutdown. Default value: true.

Enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable the Consul client. Default value: true.

FailFast.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to throw an exception (instead of logging an error) if registration fails. Default value: true.

HealthCheckCriticalTimeout.description: Gets or sets the duration after which Consul deregisters the running app when in state critical. Default value: 30m.

HealthCheckInterval.description: Gets or sets how often Consul should perform an HTTP health check. Default value: 10s.

HealthCheckPath.description: Gets or sets the relative URL to the health endpoint of the running app. Default value: /actuator/health.

HealthCheckTimeout.description: Gets or sets the timeout Consul should use for an HTTP health check. Default value: 10s.

HealthCheckTlsSkipVerify.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Consul should skip TLS verification for HTTP health checks. Default value: false.

HealthCheckUrl.description: Gets or sets the absolute URL to the health endpoint of the running app (overrides 'Steeltoe.Discovery.Consul.Configuration.ConsulDiscoveryOptions.HealthCheckPath').

Enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the running app periodically sends TTL (time-to-live) heartbeats. Default value: true.

IntervalRatio.description: Gets or sets the rate at which the running app sends TTL heartbeats, relative to 'Steeltoe.Discovery.Consul.Configuration.ConsulHeartbeatOptions.TtlValue' and 'Steeltoe.Discovery.Consul.Configuration.ConsulHeartbeatOptions.TtlUnit'. Default value: 0.66.

TtlUnit.description: Gets or sets the unit for 'Steeltoe.Discovery.Consul.Configuration.ConsulHeartbeatOptions.TtlValue' ("ms", "s", "m" or "h"). Default value: s.

TtlValue.description: Gets or sets how often a TTL heartbeat must be sent to be considered healthy. Default value: 30.

Heartbeat.description: Gets or sets settings related to heartbeats.

HostName.description: Gets or sets the hostname to register the running app with (if 'Steeltoe.Discovery.Consul.Configuration.ConsulDiscoveryOptions.PreferIPAddress' is false).

IPAddress.description: Gets or sets the IP address to register the running app with (if 'Steeltoe.Discovery.Consul.Configuration.ConsulDiscoveryOptions.PreferIPAddress' is true).

InstanceGroup.description: Gets or sets the metadata "group" value to use when registering the running app.

InstanceId.description: Gets or sets the unique ID to register the running app under.

InstanceZone.description: Gets or sets the metadata zone value to use when registering the running app.

Metadata.description: Gets metadata key/value pairs used when registering the running app.

Port.description: Gets or sets the port number to register the running app with.

PreferIPAddress.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to register the running app with IP address instead of hostname. Default: false.

QueryPassing.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to filter on health status 'passing' when querying for service instances. Default value: true.

Register.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to register the running app as a service instance. Default value: true.

RegisterHealthCheck.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable periodic health checking for the running app. Default value: true.

Enabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to try again When registering the running app fails. Default value: false.

InitialInterval.description: Gets or sets the time to wait (in milliseconds) after the first registration failure. Default value: 1000.

MaxAttempts.description: Gets or sets the maximum number of registration attempts (if retries are enabled). Default value: 6.

MaxInterval.description: Gets or sets the upper bound (in milliseconds) for intervals. Default value: 2000.

Multiplier.description: Gets or sets the factor to increment the next interval with. Default value: 1.1.

Retry.description: Gets settings related to retrying requests.

Scheme.description: Gets or sets the scheme to register the running app with ("http" or "https"). Default value: http.

ServiceName.description: Gets or sets the friendly name to register the running app with.

Tags.description: Gets the tags used when registering the running app.

UseAspNetCoreUrls.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to register with the port number ASP.NET Core is listening on. Default value: true.

UseNetworkInterfaces.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether 'System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces' is used to determine 'Steeltoe.Discovery.Consul.Configuration.ConsulDiscoveryOptions.IPAddress' and 'Steeltoe.Discovery.Consul.Configuration.ConsulDiscoveryOptions.HostName'. Default value: false.

Host.description: Gets or sets the hostname or IP address of the Consul server. Default value: localhost.

Password.description: Gets or sets password for HTTP authentication.

Port.description: Gets or sets the port number the Consul server is listening on. Default value: 8500.

Scheme.description: Gets or sets the scheme to connect with the Consul server ("http" or "https"). Default value: http.

Token.description: Gets or sets the authentication token passed in each request to the server.

Username.description: Gets or sets the username for HTTP authentication.

WaitTime.description: Gets or sets the maximum duration for a blocking request.

Consul.description: Configuration options to use in creating a Consul client. See the documentation of the Consul client for more details.

Name.description: Gets or sets the name of this application.

Application.description: Fallback configuration settings that describe this application.

DefaultHostname.description: Gets or sets the default hostname. Default value: localhost.

DefaultIPAddress.description: Gets or sets the default IP address. Default value: 127.0.0.1.

IgnoredInterfaces.description: Gets or sets a comma-separated list of network interfaces to ignore.

PreferredNetworks.description: Gets or sets a comma-separated list of preferred networks.

SkipReverseDnsLookup.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to skip reverse DNS lookups.

UseOnlySiteLocalInterfaces.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use only site-local network interfaces.

Inet.description: Provides settings for resolving network interfaces.
